Package GlooKit.GlooFramework

Blah Blah Blah stuff goes here, I presume.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Button
    A Button is a KitBit that can perform an action when clicked on.
    Canvas
    A Canvas is a KitBit with a frame and a label that does not have any children.
    ColSpan
    A ColSpan is a Div which has a list of children that will be drawn vertically from top to bottom in the order added.
    DefaultBatch  
    DefaultVertex  
    Div
    A Div is like an HTML Div.
    GlooApplication
    A GlooApplication is a game (or other application) within a GLWF window that handles the game loop for the whole application.
    GlooApplicationConfiguration
    GlooApplicationConfiguration is essentially a handle for accessing config files (.cfg) for the GlooApplication Allows for the configuration of fullscreen mode, window pointSize, and frames per second
    GlooApplicationWindow  
    Input  
    InputPanel  
    KitBit
    KitBits are the building blocks of the Visual Gloo Framework, designed to mimic HTML elements in many ways.
    Modal
    A Modal is a Nook that disappears when it is clicked off of.
    Nook
    A Nook is a KitBit that is input-opaque with a default z-coordinate of 1.
    Room
    Rooms are owned by a GlooApplication and are the visual state of the application.
    RowSpan
    A RowSpan is a Div which has a list of children that will be drawn horizontally across from left to right in the order added.
    ScrollPanel
    ScrollPanel is a Canvas, but can scroll ScrollPanel extends Canvas
    TextBatch
